Why are the 3 DVDs not split up into separate files, so one can get one or two DVDs only? I have a slow connection, so all savings count :-)   Not complaining, this was meant as constructive critisism. Thanks for putting the series here.

Well Glenn74. It is a mini series... so it would be really boring to see just one dvd, cuz they are all connected. That is why I didnt split them.

Didnt think anyone would care eighter. :P
